remarks: An element of a mapping filter.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 8-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
elfm $p |- ( ( X e. C /\ B e. ( fBas ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) -> ( A e. ( ( X FilMap F ) ` B ) <-> ( A C_ X /\ E. x e. B ( F " x ) C_ A ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d F x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
